info.name: Minds Dark Blue
info.description:
This is a modified version of the style: Minds.com Dark by 2E0PGS: 
https://userstyles.org/styles/136052/minds-com-dark

All I've done is altered a few colours to my liking.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.4
Licence: GNU v3
Last Edit: 08/05/2017 21:33
Repository: https://bitbucket.org/2E0PGS/userstyles/overview
All credit goes to the original creator. I just tweaked some colours and made it more suited to my liking.

*Fixed colours for new trending hashtags tab and many other areas.
*Still need to fix the messenger colours and some buttons. Will get around to that when I have time and better knowledge in figuring out how.
